# LEO.GWAS from Layered Exploratory Omics (LEO)

> Unveiling the Depths of Genomic Data, Layer by Layer.

### Introduction

**Layered Exploratory Omics** (LEO) is a tool specifically designed for
deep analysis of genomic data. It employs a multi-layered exploratory
approach to help researchers (**mostly myself**) uncover the complex
biological information hidden behind their data. Combining cutting-edge
statistical and computational methodologies, LEO offers a user-friendly
interface and powerful data-processing capabilities, enabling users
ranging from beginners to advanced to effectively explore and analyze
their omics data.

### Development Status

**LEO is currently in the early stages of development**. We welcome
feedback from developers, researchers, and users to help improve the
product. Please note that some features may not be fully stable yet, and
interfaces may change based on user feedback.

### Download

``` r
devtools::install_github("laleoarrow/leo.gwas", dependencies = TRUE)
# or
pak::pkg_install("laleoarrow/leo.gwas", dependencies = TRUE)
```

### How to Contribute

We encourage and welcome contributions to LEO from the community. If you
are interested in contributing code or documentation, please contact me
by submitting a issue.

### License

LEO is proprietary software. All rights reserved. Please refer to the
LICENSE file for terms and restrictions.

### Contact Information

For more information or assistance, please contact us at [Ao
Lu](mailto:luao@stu.cqmu.edu.cn).

### Citation

If you use `leo.gwas` in your work, please cite:

``` r
citation("leo.gwas")
```

``` bibtex
@Manual{leo.gwas,
  title = {leo.gwas: Layered Exploratory Omics (LEO)},
  author = {Ao Lu},
  year = {2026},
  note = {R package version 0.0.2},
  url = {https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/}
}
```

**We look forward to collaborating with researchers and developers
worldwide to advance innovation and progress in genomic data analysis!**

# Package index

## Basic Utilities

Core helper functions from `R/0.basic_tools.R`.

- [`across_df_na()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/across_df_na.md)
  : Across a df to count na

- [`across_df_TF()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/across_df_TF.md)
  : Across a df to count TRUE and FALSE

- [`is_complementary()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`fetch_indel()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`fetch_non_indel()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`duplicated_SNP_lines()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`slice1_SNP_lines()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`fetch_same_direcrtion()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`any_na()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  :

  Helper functions for `leo.gwas_qc`

- [`chisq_p_value()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/chisq_p_value.md)
  : Give precise p-value for chi-square test

- [`count_duplicate_element()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/count_duplicate_element.md)
  : Count or Identify Duplicates in a Vector

- [`count_matching_elements()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/count_matching_elements.md)
  : Count or Identify Matches of a Pattern in a Vector

- [`get_id()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/get_id.md)
  : Get Unique Identifier for Genetic Data

## Annotation

Annotation and mapping workflows from `R/0.annotation.R`.

- [`add_rsid()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/add_rsid.md)
  : Convert CHR:BP to rsID (not recommended)

- [`add_rsid_using_ref()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/add_rsid_using_ref.md)
  : Add rsID based on local reference file (recommended)

- [`add_chrpos()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/add_chrpos.md)
  : Convert rsID to CHR & BP

- [`annotate_cpg_sites()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/annotate_cpg_sites.md)
  : Annotate CpG Sites with Gene Information

- [`leo_map_GtoCP()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_map_GtoCP.md)
  : Map Gene Symbols to Genomic Positions

- [`map_gene_to_chrbp_using_TxDb()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_to_chrbp_using_TxDb.md)
  : Map Gene Symbols Using Bioconductor Packages

- [`map_gene_to_chrbp_using_gtf()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_to_chrbp_using_gtf.md)
  : Map Gene Symbols Using GTF File

- [`map_gene_to_chrbp_using_biomaRt()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_to_chrbp_using_biomart.md)
  : Map Gene Symbols to Genomic Positions Using biomaRt

- [`map_gene_to_tss_using_gtf()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_to_tss_using_gtf.md)
  : Map Genes to Their TSS Positions

- [`map_ensg_to_chrbp_using_biomaRt()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_ensg_to_chrbp_using_biomaRt.md)
  : Map Ensembl Gene IDs to Genomic Positions using biomaRt

- [`map_ensg_to_tss_using_biomaRt()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_ensg_to_tss_using_biomaRt.md)
  : Map Ensembl Gene IDs to TSS Using biomaRt

- [`map_ensg_to_gene_using_org.Hs.eg.db()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_ensg_to_gene_using_org.Hs.eg.db.md)
  :

  Map Ensembl IDs to Gene Symbols using `org.Hs.eg.db`

- [`map_ensg_to_gene_using_biomaRt()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_ensg_to_gene_using_biomaRt.md)
  : Map Ensembl Gene IDs to Gene Symbols using biomaRt

- [`map_gene_to_ensembl()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_to_ensembl.md)
  : Map Gene Symbols to Ensembl IDs

- [`map_gene_class_using_annotables()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_class_using_annotables.md)
  :

  Map Gene Symbols to biotype & description via **annotables**

- [`map_gene_class_using_biomarRt()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/map_gene_class_using_biomarRt.md)
  :

  Map Gene Symbols to biotype & description via **biomaRt** (GRCh38 â†’
  GRCh37 fallback)

## Visualization

Plotting and locus visualization from `R/0.visual_tools.R`.

- [`leo_scale_color()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_scale_color.md)
  : Apply Color Palette to ggplot
- [`correlation_calculate()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/correlation_calculate.md)
  : Calculate Correlation between Two Vectors
- [`correlation_draw()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/correlation_draw.md)
  : Draw Correlation between Two Vectors
- [`group_comparison_draw()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/group_comparison_draw.md)
  : Draw Group Comparison for a Continuous Variable
- [`ld_ps_index()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/ld_ps_index.md)
  : Loci_plot: Calculate the LD-matrix (LD r2) for the index SNP
- [`locuszoomr_loc()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/locuszoomr_loc.md)
  : Loci_plot: prepare the locus data for locuszoomr
- [`plot_gsMap()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/plot_gsMap.md)
  : Plot gsMap (full & highlight) with robust color mapping
- [`plot_gsMap_color()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/plot_gsMap_color.md)
  : Build color maps for gsMap plots (helper function)
- [`save_regional_plot()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/save_regional_plot.md)
  : Loci_plot: save_regional_plot

## PRS and ML

PRS modeling and ranking from `R/prs_tools.R`.

- [`dr.prs()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/dr.prs.md)
  [`combine_rank()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/dr.prs.md)
  : DuoRank PRS (Dr.PRS)
- [`catboost_prs()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/catboost_prs.md)
  [`catboost_prs_target()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/catboost_prs.md)
  [`catboost_prs_rank()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/catboost_prs.md)
  : CatBoost PRS utilities
- [`lasso_prs()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/lasso_prs.md)
  [`lasso_prs_target()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/lasso_prs.md)
  [`lasso_prs_rank()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/lasso_prs.md)
  : Iterative Lasso PRS (iLasso) utilities
- [`plink_clump_hla_aware()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/plink_clump_hla_aware.md)
  : HLA-aware PLINK clumping (Yet implemented)

## Two-Sample MR

MR data prep and analysis from `R/tsmr_tools.R`.

- [`clump_data_local()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/clump_data_local.md)
  : Perform LD Clumping Locally or via Reference Panel

- [`extract_instruments_local()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/extract_instruments_local.md)
  : Extract instruments locally for MR Analysis

- [`find_proxy()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/find_proxy.md)
  : find_proxy

- [`format_outcome()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/format_outcome.md)
  : format outcome data

- [`is_complementary()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`fetch_indel()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`fetch_non_indel()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`duplicated_SNP_lines()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`slice1_SNP_lines()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`fetch_same_direcrtion()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  [`any_na()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/gwas_qc_helpers.md)
  :

  Helper functions for `leo.gwas_qc`

- [`filter_chr_basedonSNP_p()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/filter_chr_basedonSNP_p.md)
  : Filter Chromosomes Based on SNP P-value Threshold

- [`filter_chr_basedonSNP_p_qtltools()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/filter_chr_basedonSNP_p_qtltools.md)
  :

  Filter Chromosomes Based on SNP P-value Threshold for `.qtltoolsnomi`
  files

- [`leo_iterator()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_iterator.md)
  : Leo batch iterator builder

- [`mr_one_pair()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/mr_one_pair.md)
  : perform_mr_for_one_pair

- [`mr_scatter_plot_modified()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/mr_scatter_plot_modified.md)
  : Modified MR Scatter Plot

- [`mrlap_one_pair()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/mrlap_one_pair.md)
  : mrlap_one_pair

## SMR and BESD

SMR/BESD processing from `R/smr_besd_tools.R`.

- [`combine_smr_res_chr()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/combine_smr_res_chr.md)
  : Combine SMR Results for All Chromosomes

- [`combine_smr_res_1outcome()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/combine_smr_res_1outcome.md)
  :

  Combine `.fdr` files for one or multiple outcomes (seperately)

- [`leo_smr_adjust()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_smr_adjust.md)
  : Adjust SMR Results with FDR and Bonferroni Corrections

- [`leo_smr_adjust_loop()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_smr_adjust_loop.md)
  : Batch Adjust SMR Results with FDR and Bonferroni Corrections

- [`leo_smr_extract_sig_res()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_smr_extract_sig_res.md)
  :

  Extract significant results from `.all` files

- [`leo_smr_merge_shared_probes()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo_smr_merge_shared_probes.md)
  : Merge multiple SMR files and keep only shared probes for 2 outcomes

## HLA Tools

HLA region helpers from `R/hla_tools.R`.

- [`HLA_get()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/HLA_get.md)
  : Extract HLA region from genomic summary data
- [`HLA_exclude()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/HLA_exclude.md)
  : Exclude HLA region from genomic summary data

## Summary QC

Summary statistics QC from `R/summary_qc.R`.

- [`leo.gwas_qc()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/leo.gwas_qc.md)
  : GWAS summary QC pipeline (chip + imputed)
- [`check_significant_SNP()`](https://laleoarrow.github.io/leo.gwas/reference/check_significant_SNP.md)
  : locate the significant SNP for conditional analysis
